author: Jeffrey A. Tucker
description:
A couple of activists visited the Children's Health Defence conference to get attendees to endorse a fake study while on film. Their plot was foiled, and they were confronted by Brownstone Institute's Jeffrey A. Tucker.

The post Exposed: The Hoax that Targeted Health Freedom appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Exposed: The Hoax that Targeted Health Freedom

author: Jonathan Barr
description:
The UKHSA refused to publish data that could link the Covid vaccine to excess deaths, the Telegraph reports, arguing that it would cause bereaved relatives "distress or anger".

The post Government “Withholding Data That May Link COVID Jab to Excess Deaths” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Government “Withholding Data That May Link COVID Jab to Excess Deaths”

author: Sallust
description:
Thatcher wanted to 'change Britain from a dependent to a self-reliant society', but our present Government seems dedicated to the exact opposite, writes Sallust

The post A Government On The Edge Of A Precipice appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: A Government On The Edge Of A Precipice

author: Jonathan Barr
description:
The Mail submitted Freedom of Information requests to Britain's police forces asking how many arrests they had made for 'offensive' social media posts. The numbers are alarmingly high, and the discrepancies between between different forces show how the UK's speech laws are vague and open to interpretation.

The post Britain’s Police State Unmasked: The Shocking Numbers Clapped in Handcuffs Over ‘Offensive’ Social Media Posts appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Britain’s Police State Unmasked: The Shocking Numbers Clapped in Handcuffs Over ‘Offensive’ Social Media Posts

author: Chris Morrison
description:
The UK Met Office's excuses for its invented temperature data from non-existent stations get more fanciful by the day, says Chris Morrison. A fresh FOI release has brought forth yet another unconvincing explanation.

The post EXCLUSIVE: New Freedom of Information Request and the UK Met Office has to Rewrite its Temperature Explanations Again appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: EXCLUSIVE: New Freedom of Information Request and the UK Met Office has to Rewrite its Temperature Explanations Again

author: Steven Tucker
description:
Joey Barton has been found guilty of 'malicious communications' offences. But on closer inspection, what he's really been convicted of is breaching woke neo-blasphemy laws, says Steven Tucker.

The post Joey Barton Has Been Found Guilty of Breaching Woke Neo-Blasphemy Laws appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Joey Barton Has Been Found Guilty of Breaching Woke Neo-Blasphemy Laws

author: Will Jones
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
